scripts.build:lib: npm run -w @doggo/game-random build && npm run -w @doggo/card-game build
scripts.build: npm run build:contracts && npm run build:product
scripts.watch: npm run build:contracts && npm run watch:product
scripts.cardgame:test: npm run -w @doggo/cli start -- simulate 1,2,3,4,5,6 11,12,13,14,15,16 --seed 123 --output ../docs/02-Main/01-Milestone/02-Test-Match.md && npm run -w @doggo/cli start -- card-table 0 5000 --output ../docs/02-Main/01-Milestone/03-First-5000-Cards.md && npm run -w @doggo/cli start -- simulate 1,2,3,4,5,6 11,12,13,14,15,16 --seed 456 --output ../docs/02-Main/01-Milestone/02-Test-Match-456.md && npm run -w @doggo/cli start -- card 1337 && npm run -w @doggo/cli start -- simulate 999991,999992,999993 999994,999995,999996 --seed 789 --output ../docs/02-Main/01-Milestone/04-Test-Match-789.md && npm run -w @doggo/cli start -- card-table 0 5000 --output ../docs/02-Main/01-Milestone/05-Second-5000-Cards.md && npm run -w @doggo/cli start -- simulate 99991,99992,99993 99994,99995,99996 --seed 987 --spit-out
